'''Radiant Spincrystal 42''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Red Leaf on the Chessboard]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It has a chance to be sold by the [[Teapot Traveling Salesman]].
